instructions:
I shall read to you a number of characteristics that belong to a particular person. Please listen to them carefully and try to form an impression of the kind of person described. You will later be asked to give a brief characterization of the person in just a few sentences. I will read the list slowly and will repeat it once. After forming your impression, please complete the following task.
Note: 'warm' and 'cold' were omitted from the initial list but are now provided for selection.

items.question: Which characteristic better fits the person described?
